body.name: PIKETS Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Dual Nozzle (Frontal and Rear Wash) Non-Electric Fresh Water Toilet Seat Attachment with Nozzle Self Cleaning, Adjustable Water Pressure(Chrome Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 48 mins
features: Fresh - Get a fresh toilet experience at a reasonable price. Try washing the rear with fresh water, and you will immediately get clean and confident that you have never had before.

Work - The knob switch of the bidet is upgraded to a button design, which makes it easier to switch modes. Each mode is separately distinguished, simple, and clear. The water pressure knob allows you to adjust the water pressure more smoothly, creating a comfortable and easy-to-use experience.

DIY - Simple installation process, provides all the necessary parts that need to be used when installing the bidet. The bidet can be installed in just fifteen minutes, and it's not that difficult. It does not need electricity to start!
Frugal - Really save paper towels, everyone thinks so. A bidet costs about the same as a box of 24 rolls of toilet paper and can last for years, which is sustainable.
More - PIKETS offers a 20-month warranty! You can contact us for any problems you have with your bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly nice product
reviews.reviewText: So just to be honest, me and my son were watching a movie and I bought this for him. He’s 13 as a gag gift for Christmas. And I had honestly always wondered what it would be like to use a bidet as I have never. So I just installed it last night. I have to say installation was a cakewalk, all of the equipment needed. It has a T that I have pictured that connected to the bottom of the bowl it had Teflon tape included. I did give clear instructions although I did not even use the instructions. It was so simple I just put it right together by Teflon tape all of the joints, snug them up by hand, I did not even have to use a wrench . Everything was very self-explanatory. The only thing that I would say could be improved is the look of there are two snaps valance that hold the unit in place. I don’t know how to describe them other than they are 2 inch discs. OK and I know that it’s made to universally fit in the toilet so they have to make them so big , I just wish I wouldn’t be able to see them quite so much there’s a good 3/4 of an inch hanging off the sides. But that’s me as a incredibly OCD person looking at that and I don’t think that they could actually change the design without making it specific to each toilet, which would not be worth it to them. So I adjusted everything exactly as needed. I had it completely installed within five minutes of starting no issues no leaks. The buttons are pretty self-explanatory , there’s a big booty button and then a female button and then the other button which I couldn’t figure out at first I thought it was broken but that is a self cleaning button and it shoots water down on there. There’s two different shafts that shoot water at two different angles, one for the buuddy and one for the female part. And then there’s a third button that actually shoots water down those two shafts I guess just to clean off any residual splash back from the cleaning process which I find to be an incredibly nice hygienic feature so I don’t have to reach my hand inside the toilet to clean it off. Works like a charm and hit the buttons work good the variable speed knob, adjust the amount of spray that you get which is all I mean it’s just really nice for the money, so I’ll give this five stars all the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Confusing buttons but works great
reviews.reviewText: The bidet delivers a refreshing and hygienic cleansing experience, elevating bathroom routines. Installation was straightforward, and the adjustable settings provide a personalized cleanse. The self-cleaning feature adds a layer of convenience, maintaining hygiene standards. Water pressure is adequate, though a slightly stronger option would be beneficial. The durable construction ensures longevity, but the plastic components feel a bit less premium.While the bidet’s functionality significantly enhances cleanliness, a warm water option could elevate the user experience further. The nozzle positioning is adjustable, catering to individual preferences. The bidet’s eco-friendly nature is commendable, reducing the need for excessive toilet paper.In conclusion, this bidet offers a worthwhile investment for those seeking a more environmentally friendly and hygienic alternative. With a few refinements in water pressure and material quality, it has the potential to become a top-tier bathroom accessory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Install is fairly simple, and works well
reviews.reviewText: Originally got this for my mother after she had heart surgery but the whole family has come to love the convenience and cleanliness of this bidet.After using this for a couple months I can say this has held up pretty well especially for the price. We are in the process of moving and using the bathroom in the new place just isn't as nice as we have gotten use to the bidet, can't wait to finish moving and get this moved over from the old location to new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had one years ago and missed it. This was very affordable and works like a charm. Minutes to install and you’re off to a clean tush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low price great quality
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works great was hesitate due to low price but we'll worth the money

The bidet attachment I have tested is the PIKETS Bidet Attachment for Toilet. This attachment promises to transform any standard toilet into a bidet and provide a refreshing and hygienic cleansing experience.First of all, the installation of the PIKETS Bidet Attachment was quick and easy. It only took me about 10 minutes to set it up with the provided instructions and tools. The attachment fits neatly under the toilet seat, and the water connection was simple to connect.In terms of functionality, the PIKETS Bidet Attachment did not disappoint. The water pressure was adjustable, and the nozzle could be positioned to ensure effective cleaning. The bidet function was particularly useful during my menstrual cycle, as it provided a gentle and soothing cleaning experience.The PIKETS Bidet Attachment also helped me reduce my use of toilet paper, which is great for the environment and my wallet. Plus, the attachment comes in a variety of fun colors, so it can add a touch of personality to any bathroom.Overall, I would highly recommend the PIKETS Bidet Attachment. It’s easy to install, functional, and eco-friendly. It has definitely made my bathroom routine more comfortable and hygienic.

Am Anfang leicht skeptisch gewesen aber nachdem ersten Einsatz voll zufrieden. Das Bidet, welches ich erstmals in Japan kennenlerne durfte erfüllt seinen Zweck. Bequeme Reinigung garantiert. In jedem Haushalt gehört eins!Verarbeitung solide, gewöhnliche Plastikeinheit.Einfache Montage am WC und ich musste den Anschluss an Waschbecken mit dem T-Ventil wählen. Super druck und alles sitzt fest.Würde ich jeder Person empfehlen, bei dem der Waschbecken nicht allzu weit weg steht bzw. der WC Kasten nicht versteckt ist.

reviews.reviewTitle: Save money on Toilet Paper, get cleaner than you're used to!
reviews.reviewText: I just have to say, getting a bidet was one of the best decisions I've made! I was skeptical at first, but now I'm so happy I ordered it.First of all, the cost savings on toilet paper are incredible. Using a bidet drastically reduces the amount of toilet paper needed, which means I'm saving money in the long run. It's a win-win situation.Setting up the bidet was a breeze. It was super easy to hook up, and I didn't encounter any difficulties. The instructions were clear, and within no time, I had it up and running. No need to hire a professional or deal with complicated installations.What's even better is that the bidet is very reasonably priced. It offers great value for the money. You don't have to break the bank to enjoy the benefits of a bidet. It's a cost-effective investment that pays off in terms of cleanliness, comfort, and saving on toilet paper expenses.Overall, I'm thrilled with my bidet. It has exceeded my expectations in terms of convenience, affordability, and the cost savings on toilet paper. If you're considering getting a bidet, I highly recommend it. It's a game-changer for your bathroom experience, and you'll wonder how you ever lived without it.
Like it ..works great..simple to install..cleanest bum in town..🤣
